title: I've been hacked and my Rp is gone with a stupid name change...
body: I wrote in to riot already via their support boards and it seems like they are never ever going to reply. I'm at a loss here because this name is really annoying me " R GAMES2016 NEWS " yuck... can someone like help me find a way to get my name changed back or even possibly have my rp back... So desperate for help :(

replies.body:
We cannot address these types of issues here on the boards, but if you remain patient,  a recovery specialist will get in contact with you on your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Same here, Riot told me they didn't detect any form of hack...
